content: mini mushroom by shellowy ☆ basic info this is a pattern for a mini mushroom doll which is 4 inches /10cm tall and 3 inches / 8cm wide ☆ disclaimer you can t share sell or claim this pattern as yours but you can obviously sell the dolls you make with it and make your own pattern with this as a base credit when making the doll is appreciated ☆ materials ● red yarn ● white yarn ● black yarn for the mouth ● 2 8mm safety eyes ● any kind of stuffing you prefer ● embroidery needle or any kind of thick needle which could help you sew/embroider on the mouth and spots on the cap ☆ abbreviations ● magic_ring magic_ring ● slip_stitch slip-stitch ● single_crochet single_crochet ● increase increase ● decrease decrease ● bb bobble stitch ● swc switch color ● fo fasten_off ● blo back loops only ● fro front loops only ☆ important notes a bobble stitch consists of a certain amount of double crochets done together in one stitch in this pattern we will be doing 6 per bobble some also call this a popcorn though there are differences depending on the crocheter see video for reference of bobble stitch do 6 instead of 5 to make it thicker but it s not necessary https //m youtube com/watch v=86g8f3menvg 1 ● cap and body start with red any color you want the cap to be 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 2 6inc 12 3 12sc 12 4 1sc 1inc x 6 18 5 18sc 18 6 2sc 1inc x 6 24 7 24sc 24 8 3sc 1inc x 6 30 9 30sc 30 10 4sc 1inc x 6 36 11 36sc 36 12 5sc 1inc x 6 42 start embroidering/adding the spots on the cap of the mushroom with the white what i like to do for the smaller spots is that i make a square around the 4 holes surrounding a stitch and then i go with the yarn diagonally until the stitch can no longer be seen underneath if you do diagonal and then square then it doesn t cover as much or look as good see the image for reference for the bigger spots instead i tend to use the holes surrounding 4 stitches and i pass the yarn multiple times to get the spots chunkier and make them cover more space you can also connect the yarn through the other holes ex corner to opposite side middle as long as it is inside the square and the diagonal ones are the last to make it look as neat as
